mapper.select: select count(*) from users where users_id=#{users_id}
mapper.insert: insert into users(users_id, users_pass, users_name, users_birthday, users_zipcode, users_address, users_phone, users_email, users_gender, users_note, users_regdate) values (#{users_id}, #{users_pass}, #{users_name}, #{users_birthday}, #{users_zipcode}, #{users_address}, #{users_phone}, #{users_email}, #{users_gender}, #{users_note}, now())
mapper.update: update users set users_point=users_point-#{point} where users_id=#{users_id}
